QuestData.Title: Thinning the... Herd?
QuestData.Description: The furbolg are more numerous than we expected in these southern regions. They have also been far more aggressive here than we would like.$b$bWith our resources divided between hunting down elves and harvesting much-needed lumber, that leaves you to help me put an end to our furbolg distraction.$b$bI have research to conduct here. In the meantime, I need you to take a more hands-on approach. Bring me the ears of nearby furbolg as proof to Tarkan that the problem is being dealt with.
QuestData.LogDescription: Senani Thunderheart at Silverwind Retreat wants you to collect 15 Furbolg Ears from Foulweald Totemics and Foulweald Ursas.
QuestData.RewardText: Good work, $r.$b$bThis should keep them licking their wounds for a time.
